remarks: Closure of supremum of subset of ` CH ` .  Definition of supremum in Proposition 1 of [Kalmbach] p. 65.  Shows that ` CH ` is a complete lattice.  Also part of Definition 3.4-1 in [MegPav2000] p. 2345 (PDF p. 8).  (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: chsupcl $p |- ( A C_ CH -> ( \/H ` A ) e. CH ) $.
